availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Hull (Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and notary)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and notary. Kentucky native. Graduated from the University of Louisville College of Law in 1858. Attorney in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1864. Notary public in Jefferson County in 1864.

ab.bibl: "Medical and Law Commencement of the University of Louisville," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), March 2, 1858, p. 2; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 7, p. 46; KYR-0001-007-0312.
